TEXT.TITLE: <COMTERM INC> YEAR JAN 31 LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr loss 30 cts vs profit eight cts Oper net loss 5,887,996 vs profit 1,620,312 Revs 32.4 mln vs 48.5 mln Note: 1987 net excludes extraordinary gain of 2.7 mln dlrs or 14 cts shr from settlement of provision for discontinued operations vs yr-ago tax gain of 562,248 dlrs or three cts shr. Reuter
